import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../App.css' const Movie = () => { const [movie,setMovie] = useState({}); const { id } = useParams() useEffect(()=>{ const getMovie = async()=>{ const response = await axios.get(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/${id}?api_key=2a75f43539036630c5e2f12e4ed0b677`) console.log(response); const {data} = response; console.log(data) setMovie(data) } getMovie(); },[]) return ( <>
{ Object.keys(movie).length > 0 ? (

) } export default Movie
